Description The system supports detection and assistance in (subset of) critical conditions while outside, e.g. automatic notification of ambulance when health problems are detected by wearable sensors, or help in situations where the AP has fallen. Measure to check we should reach a clear dedined subset of the inhome support Rationale The system supports detection and assistance in (subset of) critical conditions while outside, e.g. automatic notification of ambulance when health problems are detected by wearable sensors, or help in situations where the AP has fallen. Reference OASIS R2.1.81 WP: 4,1 Ranking: 4
Assistance outside/ planning of and assistance while on trip/holiday
Requirement Taskforce
WP4 WP1
